data.actual_result: Delete button starts to show as if you started to slide it left to delete it.
data.expected_result: First reaction should just be normal.
data.short_description: When opening all reactions model for the first time, first reaction delete messages slightly opens then closes.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a message with a reaction. - Have permissions to remove reactions. - Open all reactions model. - Observe first reaction.
